framework.name: SOC2
framework.description: Service Organization Control 2 - Trust Services Criteria

controls.title: COSO Principle 1
controls.description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values

controls.title: COSO Principle 2
controls.description: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight

controls.title: COSO Principle 13
controls.description: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant, quality information

controls.title: COSO Principle 14
controls.description: The entity internally communicates information necessary to support the functioning of internal control

controls.title: COSO Principle 6
controls.description: The entity specifies objectives with sufficient clarity to enable the identification and assessment of risks

controls.title: COSO Principle 7
controls.description: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives and analyzes risks

controls.title: COSO Principle 16
controls.description: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations

controls.title: COSO Principle 10
controls.description: The entity selects and develops control activities that contribute to the mitigation of risks

controls.title: Logical and Physical Access Controls
controls.description: The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets

controls.title: User Registration and Authorization
controls.description: Prior to issuing system credentials and granting system access, the entity registers and authorizes new users

controls.title: Role-Based Access and Least Privilege
controls.description: The entity authorizes, modifies, or removes access based on roles, responsibilities, or the system design

controls.title: Detection and Monitoring
controls.description: To meet its objectives, the entity uses detection and monitoring procedures to identify changes

controls.title: Security Event Monitoring
controls.description: The entity monitors system components and the operation for anomalies

controls.title: Change Management
controls.description: The entity authorizes, designs, develops, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes

controls.title: Risk Mitigation
controls.description: The entity identifies, selects, and develops risk mitigation activities for risks arising from business disruptions
